protocol.name: P-GSE52067-1
protocol.text: RMA normalized data in the Sample data tables. Further processed data were derived from GeneSpring. 20 percentile to filter for low intensity and high saturated probes. P-value cut-off 0.05. Fold change cut-off log2. ID_REF =  VALUE = Log2 RMA-signal

protocol.name: P-GSE52067-2
protocol.text: Inflorescence tissue isolated on dry ice.

protocol.name: P-GSE52067-3
protocol.text: Plants were grown under standard long day growth conditions.

protocol.name: P-GSE52067-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated from pooled inflorescence tissue (n = 3) and TRIzol (Invitrogen).

protocol.name: P-GSE52067-5
protocol.text: Biotynlated aRNA were prepared according to the standard ATH1 affymetrix protocol for 6 ug total RNA.

protocol.name: P-GSE52067-6
protocol.text: Hybridized for 16 hours at 45oC on GeneChip Arabidopsis Genome Array

protocol.name: P-GSE52067-7
protocol.text: GeneChip scanned with the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000.
